dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: We've got a message here from a listener in Astana, who says, 'Congratulations to all the newly promoted officials. It's great to see such recognition for our security services.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: We've got a message here from a listener in Astana, who says, 'Congratulations to all the newly promoted officials. It's great to see such recognition for our security services.'

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and speaking of promotions, President Tokayev just issued a decree granting new military and special ranks to quite a few people.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and speaking of promotions, President Tokayev just issued a decree granting new military and special ranks to quite a few people.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev has issued a decree granting new military and special ranks, as well as class ranks, to several officials in Kazakhstan, the presidential press service reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, like Vice Admiral Serik Zhaksygalievich Burambaev, that's a significant naval promotion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, like Vice Admiral Serik Zhaksygalievich Burambaev, that's a significant naval promotion.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the decree, the rank of Vice Admiral was awarded to Serik Zhaksygalievich Burambaev.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And then, uh, five officials were given the rank of Major General in the military, including Anatoly Andreyevich Dovganyuk.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then, uh, five officials were given the rank of Major General in the military, including Anatoly Andreyevich Dovganyuk.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The military rank of Major General was conferred on Anatoly Andreyevich Dovganyuk, Almas Tynyshbekovich Isabekov, Ramil Fatkulovich Kamalov, Dauren Mukhtarkhanuly Manap, and Zhenis Mukhamedkaliyevich Maralov.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting how many different branches are represented here—National Security, Anti-Corruption, Economic Investigations...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting how many different branches are represented here-National Security, Anti-Corruption, Economic Investigations...

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, like Major General of Police for five individuals, such as Baurzhan Tolegenovich Alenov. That's a lot of new generals in one go.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, like Major General of Police for five individuals, such as Baurzhan Tolegenovich Alenov. That's a lot of new generals in one go.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The special rank of Major General of Police was awarded to Baurzhan Tolegenovich Alenov, Kairken Zhetpisbaevich Aliyev, Sagindik Kuzembaevich Ayaganov, Sarkytbai Zakirovich Kusainov, and Kaisar Abilekovich Sultanbaev.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And then there are class ranks too—State Counselor of Justice, 3rd class, for four people, including Daulet Ertaevich Akylbekov.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then there are class ranks too-State Counselor of Justice, third class, for four people, including Daulet Ertaevich Akylbekov.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Additionally, the class rank of State Counselor of Justice, 3rd class was granted to Daulet Ertaevich Akylbekov, Madiyar Bekenovich Bashybaev, Serik Akmyrzynovich Karipbekov, and Gabyt Amangeldiyevich Sadyrbekov.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It makes you wonder, like, what kind of criteria they use for these promotions, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It makes you wonder, like, what kind of criteria they use for these promotions, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. I mean, it's not just military; it's across various specialized services.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. I mean, it's not just military; it's across various specialized services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And all these names—it feels like a real strengthening of leadership across different sectors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And all these names-it feels like a real strengthening of leadership across different sectors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It's a big move by Tokayev to recognize so many at once.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. It's a big move by Tokayev to recognize so many at once.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it sends a clear message about prioritizing security and justice roles.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it sends a clear message about prioritizing security and justice roles.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Well, we'll keep an eye on how this impacts governance moving forward.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Well, we'll keep an eye on how this impacts governance moving forward.
